title: The more I play with protobelt
body:
The more I realize it's broken on champs that are already semi-mobile. Its optimal use case is to use it to get directly in the opponent's face with it, hitting with all 7 rockets for a whopping 165-330 (+77% AP) damage. For the slightly less optimal scenario where you hit with 5, it's still 135-270 (+63% AP). There is no other item in the game that offers that much additional burst when you buy it, and this is on a 2500 gold item (that is already close to gold efficiency without its active). The closest thing in competition to it is GLP, which does 100-250 (+35% AP) and slows, but doesn't require being directly on top of them. 

Like, it's good on immobile champs like annie, tf, galio, etc. But I'd say it's even better on stuff like... liss, kennen, sona (hey why not), ahri, lulu, elise, grag, vlad, and probably a couple others I'm forgetting. All champs that already can get in your face if they want to, and all benefit from the additional burst.
